title: Senna vs Sonic: When McLaren taunted Williams with a squashed hedgehog
summary: Sega's Formula 1 sponsorship deal with Williams ignited one of racing's most light-hearted and creative feuds. But no playful graphics could match the moment that Ayrton Senna seized Sonic the Hedgehog as his own

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Ayrton Senna drive for during his career?
What character was used in a playful rivalry between McLaren and Williams?
What type of sponsorship deal did Sega have with Williams?
